notes.text: This file was provided by Mikhail Mendelev (Ames Laboratory) and posted with his permission on 26 Oct. 2010. 31 May 2013: The parameter file was renamed from Ni-Zr_Mendelev_2010.eam.fs to Ni-Zr_Mendelev_2012.eam.fs and the first line in the file's header was updated to reflect the publication status. Mikhail Mendelev approved this change.
